backend/main.mo: Main canister managing products, tiers, cart, transactions, and store settings with add/update, delete, query, and cart operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old products to new schema by adding empty tiers and returning updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing frontend files and components involved in tier pricing and POS cart updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing major components, pages, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color palette, dark mode variables, and base layout styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Router setup defining all app routes and wrapping pages in the AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Application layout providing sidebar navigation, branding, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product dialog allowing create/edit with photo upload and dynamic tier pricing fields, including validation and state handling.
frontend/src/components/receipt/ReceiptL: Renders a printable receipt showing store info, transaction details, item list, totals, and optional cash payment details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login, logout, and status updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for products, cart, transactions, and store settings using the backend actor, with mutations that trigger cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based CSS variables, light/dark themes, and custom print styles for rendering receipts cleanly.
frontend/src/lib/pricing.ts: Provides utilities for validating, normalizing, and calculating tiered pricing, plus a Rupiah formatting helper.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a class name merging helper using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutSettingsPage.tsx: Settings page allowing editing of store name and optional receipt footer, with save handling and validation.
frontend/src/pages/POSPage.tsx: Point‑of‑sale interface handling product search, barcode input, local cart management, and checkout interactions.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product management page supporting search, creation, editing, deletion, and stock status display.
frontend/src/pages/ReceiptPage.tsx: Displays a printable receipt for a selected transaction using settings and product data.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Sales reports page showing totals and grouped transaction metrics across daily, weekly, or monthly periods.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Transaction history page with date filtering and navigation to individual receipts.
frontend/src/utils/reportGrouping.ts: Groups transactions by day, week, or month using date-fns and returns sorted period summaries with totals and counts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing tier/package pricing features, architectural notes, and pending feature requests using option‑B pricing rules.
